TopicTitle: 1.0 Bug: A.I.R.B.R.A.K.E.S toggle not working with Action groups

Articles.Content:
In my case, Airbrakes wont 'save' action group with toggle (As for now tested with toggle only). Open and close set separately on different AG works well. 

[http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/341w8z/does_anyone_else_have_issues_with_the_airbrakes/](http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/341w8z/does_anyone_else_have_issues_with_the_airbrakes/)

Here other person have similar problem, but in his case AIRBRAKES wont deploy at all
Airbrakes are operated with the brakes key, not sure if they are enabled for action groups ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

One of three actions does not work. Is it really intended? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Ofc. with brakes (for me) works flawless... If a little too slow compared to B9's

I experienced the same issue with the airbrakes.

I removed them from the 'brake' action group and assigned them to a custom action group to toggle.

Upon loading loading the craft on the runway, these two alterations to the actions groups got reverted.
Same, remove from brake group add to custom group. Launch craft and is reverted back to brake group and no custom.

Hey guys, I'm on Windows 8.1 64 Bit using the latest Nvidia drivers. Toggling the new Air Brakes with Action Groups does apperently nothing. **The Action Group entry seems to disapear** after launching & reverting to SPH. Maybe a problem with saving it? With Action Groups I mean custom ones. They work with B or the Brake Toggle.

Figured out now that this happens to vessels with fairings attached to it. As soon as I jettisoned them the airbreaks deploy.

Does this apply to your vessels as well?
Not in my case - tested on spaceplane, default AERIS 3A
I took experienced the same thing with a jet i've been working on recently. They can't be used in custom action groups when i de thingyed them from the brakes they still activated.
